# Quantum Field Dynamics

> Full working codebase for Quantum Field Dynamics — formal Lean 4 proofs, numerical solvers, simulations, and active research. One measured input (alpha = 1/137) derives particle masses, nuclear binding, and cosmological observables.

## Overview

- Lean 4 proof files: 249
- Proven theorems + lemmas: 1230
- Python solvers/validators: 326
- Updated: 2026-02-12

## Raw file access

Prepend to any path below: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/

## Key entry points

- [README.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/README.md): Project overview and key results
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/ProofLedger.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/ProofLedger.lean): Master proof index
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/Physics/Postulates.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/Physics/Postulates.lean): Axiomatic foundation
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/GoldenLoop.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/GoldenLoop.lean): Golden Loop: alpha -> beta
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/GA/Cl33.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/GA/Cl33.lean): Core Clifford algebra Cl(3,3)
- [qfd/shared_constants.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/qfd/shared_constants.py): Single source of truth for all constants
- [LEAN_PROOF_INDEX.txt](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/LEAN_PROOF_INDEX.txt): Flat index of all Lean proofs
- [SOLVER_INDEX.txt](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/SOLVER_INDEX.txt): Flat index of all Python solvers

## Related repositories

- [QFD-Universe](https://github.com/tracyphasespace/QFD-Universe): Curated researcher-friendly repo with sector-organized validation
- [QFD-Universe llms.txt](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/QFD-Universe/main/llms.txt): AI discovery file for QFD-Universe

## Repository structure

- `projects/Lean4/QFD/` — Lean 4 formal proofs (1100+ theorems)
- `projects/particle-physics/` — Nuclear and lepton solvers
- `projects/astrophysics/` — CMB, SNe, cosmology
- `projects/field-theory/` — Field theory validators
- `qfd/` — Core Python framework + shared constants
- `validation_scripts/` — Independent validation suite
- `visualizations/` — Interactive HTML demos
- `V22_Lepton_Analysis/` — Hill vortex lepton analysis
- `V22_Supernova_Analysis/` — SNe Ia cosmology fit
- `Photon/` — g-2 prediction suite

## Top Lean proof files (by theorem count)

- [projects/Lean4/QFD/Renormalization/FiniteLoopIntegral.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/Renormalization/FiniteLoopIntegral.lean): QFD Loop Integral Finiteness (36 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/Gravity/NoetherProjection.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/Gravity/NoetherProjection.lean): Noether Projection: Deriving ξ_QFD = k_geom² × (5/6) (24 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/Nuclear/BetaNGammaEDerivation.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/Nuclear/BetaNGammaEDerivation.lean): Asymmetry Coupling β_n (21 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/Nuclear/BetaNGammaEDerivation_Complete.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/Nuclear/BetaNGammaEDerivation_Complete.lean): Asymmetry Coupling β_n (21 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/Nuclear/CoreCompressionLaw.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/Nuclear/CoreCompressionLaw.lean): Theorems: Proven Parameter Space Properties (21 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/Lepton/RVacDerivation.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/Lepton/RVacDerivation.lean): First-Principles Derivation of R_vac = 1/√5 (20 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/Lepton/VortexStability.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/Lepton/VortexStability.lean): Hill Vortex Geometry Constants (19 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/Cosmology/AxisExtraction.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/Cosmology/AxisExtraction.lean): Phase 2: Full Uniqueness (AxisSet = {n, -n}) (17 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/EmergentAlgebra.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/EmergentAlgebra.lean): Algebraic Emergence of 4D Spacetime (17 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/GA/BasisProducts.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/GA/BasisProducts.lean): Basis Product Library for Cl(3,3) (17 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/NeutrinoMassTopology.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/NeutrinoMassTopology.lean): Topological Winding Numbers (17 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/BlackHole/SaturationLimit.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/BlackHole/SaturationLimit.lean): Vacuum Saturation Density (16 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/Cosmology/GalacticScaling.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/Cosmology/GalacticScaling.lean): Vacuum Density Profile (16 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/Gravity/GeometricCoupling.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/Gravity/GeometricCoupling.lean): k_geom Derivation Pipeline: Bare Eigenvalue (16 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/Photon/HelicityDecay.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/Photon/HelicityDecay.lean): Photon Soliton Structure (16 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/StabilityCriterion.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/StabilityCriterion.lean): QFD Theorem Z.1.5: Requirement for Global Stability (16 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/Math/Exp_Bounds_Analysis.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/Math/Exp_Bounds_Analysis.lean): Section 1: Basic Properties (15 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/Lepton/Generations.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/Lepton/Generations.lean): Generations as Spatial Isomers (Cl(3,3)) (14 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/Nuclear/AlphaNDerivation.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/Nuclear/AlphaNDerivation.lean): Nuclear Fine Structure Constant (14 theorems)
- [projects/Lean4/QFD/Nuclear/AlphaNDerivation_Complete.lean](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/QFD/Nuclear/AlphaNDerivation_Complete.lean): Nuclear Fine Structure Constant (14 theorems)

## Key Python solvers

- [qfd/verify_golden_loop.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/qfd/verify_golden_loop.py): Verify Golden Loop: α → β Derivation [validated]
- [validation_scripts/verify_golden_loop.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/validation_scripts/verify_golden_loop.py): Verify Golden Loop: α → β Derivation [validated]
- [Photon/run_all.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/Photon/run_all.py): QFD Photon Sector: Run All Numerical Calculations [active]
- [projects/field-theory/Photons_&_Solitons/run_all.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/field-theory/Photons_&_Solitons/run_all.py): QFD Photon Sector: Run All Numerical Calculations [active]
- [projects/particle-physics/nuclide-engine/run_all.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/particle-physics/nuclide-engine/run_all.py): run_all.py — Orchestrator for QFD Nuclide Engine analysis suite. [active]
- [projects/particle-physics/three-layer-lagrangian/run_all.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/particle-physics/three-layer-lagrangian/run_all.py): run_all.py — Master orchestrator for Three-Layer LaGrangian reviewer package. [active]
- [validation_scripts/validate_g2_corrected.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/validation_scripts/validate_g2_corrected.py): QFD: G-2 Validation - Corrected Calculation [validated]
- [validation_scripts/validate_lepton_isomers.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/validation_scripts/validate_lepton_isomers.py): QFD: Lepton Isomers - Geometric Mass Generation [validated]
- [Photon/analysis/validate_all_constants_as_material_properties.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/Photon/analysis/validate_all_constants_as_material_properties.py): QFD Material Science: ALL Constants as Vacuum Properties [validated]
- [Photon/analysis/validate_chaos_alignment_decay.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/Photon/analysis/validate_chaos_alignment_decay.py): QFD Atomic Resonance: Chaotic Phase Alignment → Exponential Decay [validated]
- [Photon/analysis/validate_fine_structure_scaling.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/Photon/analysis/validate_fine_structure_scaling.py): QFD: Fine Structure Constant Scaling [validated]
- [Photon/analysis/validate_g2_corrected.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/Photon/analysis/validate_g2_corrected.py): QFD: Parameter-Free Geometric g-2 Validation [validated]
- [Photon/analysis/validate_g2_from_v4.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/Photon/analysis/validate_g2_from_v4.py): QFD: Validate g-2 Anomalous Magnetic Moment Prediction from V₄ [validated]
- [Photon/analysis/validate_g2_prediction.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/Photon/analysis/validate_g2_prediction.py): QFD: G-2 Prediction Validation - Acid Test [validated]
- [Photon/analysis/validate_hbar_scaling.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/Photon/analysis/validate_hbar_scaling.py): QFD: Planck Constant Scaling Law [validated]
- [Photon/analysis/validate_hydrodynamic_c.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/Photon/analysis/validate_hydrodynamic_c.py): QFD: Hydrodynamic Derivation of Speed of Light [validated]
- [Photon/analysis/validate_hydrodynamic_c_hbar_bridge.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/Photon/analysis/validate_hydrodynamic_c_hbar_bridge.py): QFD Hydrodynamic Validation: The c - ℏ Bridge [validated]

- [Photon/analysis/validate_lyapunov_predictability_horizon.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/Photon/analysis/validate_lyapunov_predictability_horizon.py): QFD Lyapunov Predictability Horizon: Why QM Probability is Emergent [validated]

- [Photon/analysis/validate_zeeman_vortex_torque.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/Photon/analysis/validate_zeeman_vortex_torque.py): QFD Zeeman Effect: Vortex Torque → Frequency Shift [validated]
- [projects/Lean4/scripts/verify_photon_soliton.py](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tracyphasespace/Quantum-Field-Dynamics/main/projects/Lean4/scripts/verify_photon_soliton.py): Verify Photon Soliton: Stability in QFD Vacuum [validated]

## Physics summary

QFD derives from one measured input (alpha = 1/137.036):
- Golden Loop equation: 1/alpha = 2*pi^2 * (e^beta/beta) + 1 => beta = 3.043
- Lepton masses: Hill vortex geometry with beta => e, mu, tau (chi^2 < 1e-11)
- Anomalous g-2: Geometric V₄ coefficient => 0.45% error on a_e (no free params)
- Nuclear binding: 3,558 masses from soliton packing (< 1% light nuclei)
- Cosmology: SNe Ia fit with 0 free params (chi^2/dof = 1.005)
- Cosmic abundances: H/He = 75/25 from Rift mass spectrography (dual-model verified, 0 free params)
- 1100+ Lean 4 theorems proving internal mathematical consistency
